Deleting your cache directory will cause: 刪除快取目錄會導致您失去某些設定。除非有 Streamlabs 工作人員的指示，否則不要刪除快取目錄
Confirm stream title and game before goi: 在開始直播前確認直播標題與遊戲
WARNING! You will lose all scenes, sourc: 警告！您會失去所有場景、來源與設定。此動作無法復原！
Your cache directory has been successful: 您的快取目錄已成功上傳。檔案名稱 %{file} 已複製到您的剪貼簿。
Streamlabels session has been succesfull: Streamlabels 工作階段已成功重新啟動！
This action will restart the application: 此動作會重新啟動應用程式。要繼續嗎？
Show confirmation dialog when starting s: 開始直播時顯示確認對話方塊
Show confirmation dialog when stopping s: 停止直播時顯示確認對話方塊
Snap Sources to edge of screen: 將來源對齊到螢幕邊緣
Snap Sources to other sources: 將來源與其他來源對齊
Enforce streaming service bitrate limits: 執行直播服務位元速率限制
Encoder Preset (Higher = Less CPU): 編碼器預先設定 (較高 = 較少 CPU)
Generate File Name without Space: 產生沒有空格的檔案名稱
Bilinear (Fastest, but blurry if scaling: 雙線性 (速度最快，但縮放時會模糊)
Bicubic (Sharpened scaling, 16 samples): 雙三次插值 (銳利的縮放結果，16 點取樣)
Lanczos (Sharpened scaling, 32 samples): Lanczos 演算法 (銳利的縮放結果，32 點取樣)
No elements found. Consider changing the: 找不到元素。請考慮變更搜尋查詢。
Do not back up my media files in the clo: 不要將我的媒體檔案備份到雲端 (必須重新啟動應用程式)
Disable Windows audio ducking: 停用 Windows 音量自動調整
Preserved cutoff point (increase delay): 重新連線時保留的截斷點 (增加延遲)
Single click selects group. Double click: 按一下選擇群組，按兩下選擇項目
Double click selects group. Single click: 按兩下選擇群組，按一下選擇項目
Navigate to Live tab when going live: 進行直播時移動到直播標籤
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: 「直播到自訂攝取」是進階功能。Streamlabs OBS 的某些功能可能會停止運作。
Disable hardware acceleration (requires: 停用硬體加速 (必須重新啟動)
Deleting your cache directory will cause: 刪除快取目錄會導致您失去某些設定。除非有 Streamlabs 工作人員的指示，否則不要刪除快取目錄。
You can not change these settings when y: 直播時不能變更這些設定
This feature is intended for overlay des: This feature is intended for overlay designers to export their work for our Theme Store. Not all sources will be exported, use at your own risk.
